de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.adapter.connection

Interface ImcConnectionAdapter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimc.AttributeSupport, org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimc.IMCConnection, ImConnectionAdapter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ImcConnectionAdapterIetf, ImcConnectionAdapterIetfLong

    public interface ImcConnectionAdapter
extends ImConnectionAdapter, org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimc.IMCConnection, org.trustedcomputinggroup.tnc.ifimc.AttributeSupport
    Generic IMC connection adapter adapting and controlling an IMC connection.
